title: Profile
subtitle: Manage your account information and preferences
updateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
languageDescription: Choose the language you want to use throughout the application. This will affect all text, labels, and messages.
currencyDescription: Choose the currency you want to use for all rental prices and payments. Prices will be automatically converted based on current exchange rates.
emailNotificationsDescription: Receive important updates about your rentals, payments, and account information via email.
pushNotificationsDescription: Receive real-time alerts directly to your browser or mobile device when important events occur.
smsNotificationsDescription: Receive text message alerts for critical updates about your rentals and payments.
marketingEmailsDescription: Stay updated with promotional offers, new features, and rental opportunities that might interest you.
visibilityDescription: Control who can view your profile information and rental history.
allowContactFromOthers: Allow other users to contact me
contactPermissionsDescription: Decide whether other users on the platform can send you messages or contact requests.
contactInfoDescription: Allow your email and phone number to be visible to other users when they view your profile.
activityDescription: Show your rental history and activity to other users who can view your profile.
